definition: distinct/clear/orderly/pain/suffering/deciduous bush used in Chinese medicine (genus Vitex)/punishment cane (old)
surname Chu/abbr. for Hubei 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] and Hunan 湖南省[Hu2 nan2 Sheng3] provinces together/Chinese kingdom during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (722-221 BC)

sentences.english: Continue to work with the faith that unearned suffering is redemptive.
sentences.chinese: 繼續用信心工作不勞而獲的苦楚是贖回的。

sentences.english: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us, so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ.
sentences.chinese: 我們既多受基督的苦楚，就靠基督多得安慰。

sentences.english: This means that we miss our suffering altogether.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着我們一起錯過了苦楚。

sentences.english: Strumming my pain with his fingers.
sentences.chinese: 用手指彈奏出我的苦楚。

sentences.english: Your pain and your hunger, they're drivin' you home.
sentences.chinese: 你飽嘗的苦楚和睏乏，催促著歸家的腳步。

sentences.english: I find this hot weather very trying.
sentences.chinese: 我感到這種炎夏天氣很難熬苦楚。

sentences.english: But average Americans are hurting with no end to the pain in sight.
sentences.chinese: 但是普通美國民衆的苦楚卻是沒有盡頭。

sentences.english: Domplain not, no matter how bleak it seems.
sentences.chinese: 不要怨天恨地，不管此刻看來是怎麼地黯淡苦楚。

sentences.english: I must do farm work industriously, toleration distress.
sentences.chinese: 我要辛勤耕耘，忍受苦楚。

sentences.english: He hath filled me with bitterness, he hath made me drunken with wormwood.
sentences.chinese: 他用苦楚充滿我，使我飽用茵？？。

sentences.english: It is the fire of suffering that brings forth the gold of godliness. Madame Guyon
sentences.chinese: 神性的光輝是由苦楚的火焰中提煉出來的。

sentences.english: Do you not know that the end will be bitter?
sentences.chinese: 你豈不知終久必有苦楚嗎？

sentences.english: The incident reveals the terribly low international status of then Chinese government.
sentences.chinese: 李約德事件的交涉，體現了近代中國弱國地位的苦楚。

sentences.english: Because thou shalt forget thy misery, and remember it as waters that pass away
sentences.chinese: 你必忘記你的苦楚，就是想起也如流過去的水一樣。

sentences.english: That which was bitter to endure may be sweet to remember.
sentences.chinese: 苦楚往日難忍受，記起也許甜心頭。

sentences.english: Some became fools through their rebellious ways and suffered affliction because of their iniquities.
sentences.chinese: 愚妄人因自己的過犯，和自己的罪孽便受苦楚。

definition: to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
